subject: MCM Design Refresh Sprint — All 14 Tasks Complete
body:
All 14 design refresh tasks are complete and pushed to master.

Phase 1 (Tasks 1-2): exam error state + Times New Roman leak — 8eb2639
Phase 2 (Tasks 3-4): button hierarchy + dashboard progressive disclosure — 518d5a7
Phase 3 (Tasks 5-8): arena persistence, type scale, header, archive mode — dfc502b
Phase 4 (Tasks 9-14): blue borders, coach voice, curriculum titles, print polish — 43c27dc

Files touched: exam.html, index.html, shared/styles.css, shared/print.css, shared/scripts.js, final_exam_251123.html, final_exam_251123_mini.html, nonlinear_exam_mvp.html

GF has been notified to run design QA validation.
